carbon_credits.title: Automated Carbon Credit Generation from EV Charging
carbon_credits.description: Patent-pending system that automatically calculates, validates, and monetizes carbon credits from electric vehicle charging sessions
carbon_credits.technical_details: Uses real-time energy source tracking, emission factor calculations, and blockchain verification
carbon_credits.business_impact: Creates new revenue stream worth $50-200 per vehicle annually

degradation_aware.title: AI-Driven Battery Degradation Prediction and Optimization
degradation_aware.description: Machine learning system that predicts battery degradation and optimizes charging patterns for maximum lifespan
degradation_aware.technical_details: Combines battery chemistry models, usage patterns, and environmental factors for predictive analytics
degradation_aware.business_impact: Extends battery life by 15-25%, reducing replacement costs
degradation_aware.patent_status: Core algorithms protected, hardware integration pending

swap_integrity.title: Real-Time Battery Swap Station Integrity Monitoring
swap_integrity.description: IoT-enabled system for monitoring battery health, safety, and performance in swap stations
swap_integrity.technical_details: Multi-sensor fusion with predictive maintenance algorithms
swap_integrity.business_impact: Reduces downtime by 40%, ensures 99.9% station reliability

asset_valuation.title: Dynamic Blended Asset Valuation for EV Ecosystems
asset_valuation.description: Novel valuation methodology treating EV, battery, and software as integrated financial instruments
asset_valuation.technical_details: Real-time asset tracking with depreciation models and market value algorithms
asset_valuation.business_impact: Enables new financing models and insurance products

cross_border.title: Cross-Border EV Data Intelligence Platform
cross_border.description: Secure, privacy-compliant system for aggregating and monetizing international EV usage data
cross_border.technical_details: Federated learning with differential privacy and regulatory compliance automation
cross_border.business_impact: Creates global data marketplace worth $10-50M annually

sodium_ion.title: Next-Generation Sodium-Ion Battery Optimization
sodium_ion.description: Advanced control algorithms specifically designed for sodium-ion battery characteristics
sodium_ion.technical_details: Adaptive charging protocols accounting for sodium-ion chemistry differences
sodium_ion.business_impact: Enables cost-effective alternative to lithium with 30% cost reduction
sodium_ion.patent_status: Chemistry and control system patents pending
